original_title: Le ménage moderne du Madame Butterfly
overview: Le Ménage moderne du Madame Butterfly is a bisexual, hardcore pornographic film from France. It is notable for being the earliest known adult film to incorporate bisexual and homosexual intercourse. It includes "found footage" location shots of an Asian street full of rickshaws and a sailing ship on the Pacific Ocean.
title: Le ménage moderne du Madame Butterfly
